content: We are going to celebrate the Mid-Autumn Festival together in Xibei tonight.
We have officially launched our new website new.datahammer.net.
Our new term's group meeting will be in 1003@Center Building at 6p.m. every Wednesday.
Congratulations! Houjin Yu won Rank 3 in CCKS 2019 shared task!
Congratulations! Rong-Cheng Tu's paper was accepted by IJCAI 19: Object Detection based Deep Unsupervised Hashing.
